name: This Will Be Sports in 1985
description:
This Will Be Sports in 1985

Years have passed and our hero, Kruck Buckem managed to secure himself a family. But his brilliant daughter, Krunkie, has gotten into trouble at the football club! Help her prove her worth as a football player against "the baddies" in this intergalactic, highly realistic football game. You are Krunkie, you foot the ball!

Even in space, we use the term "football," deal with it!

This Space Harrier-inspired combination of sports games and arcade shoot-em-ups will give you a totally tubular time.

(You can press "m" to mute the music)

Windows Version:
